page.title: 05INTERVIEW - BROWN FARM
page.content:
Population structure As the hill farms have to be run by a family unit the area is populated by families. Some people have lived in the area all their lives, however the area is becoming increasing popular for retired couples with their own transport.
Transport There has never been a bus service through this area, the nearest bus service passing some three miles away and linking the area with Wiveliscombe and Taunton. Around Brown Farm the roads are narrow and difficult to maintain. Therefore the general state of the roads is bad and little appears to be done to maintain them. The council clips the hedges once a year and clears the ditches after heavy rain.
